metadata.title: CVE-2016-5404 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The cert_revoke command in FreeIPA does not check for the "revokecertificate" permission, which allows remote authenticated users to revokearbitrary certificates by leveraging the "retrieve certificate" permission.

criterions.comment: freeipa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
